name: Coast Guard – Beach Car Driver
description:
Get ready to park your vehicle on the beach. Take your seat and drive your car through different exotic beaches where you will explore parking lots. Be careful, beach parking zone are full of hurdles and blocks, you will need to avoid colliding and not to fail any level of this beach parking game. Finish all the levels and shows that you are the best bus driver.

We give you an unforgettable car driving and parking experience in the game. Smooth and easy controls allow you to control your car effortlessly and park easily. Realistic physics make driving enjoyable! Become the master of the steering wheel in the beautiful beach environment!

Play and enjoy the game with all your favorites’ vehicles like 4x4 SUV, Jeep, luxury cars and Ambulance.

Game Features:

• Many challenging Car parking missions
• Smooth and easy driving controls
• Detailed 3d beach environment
• Realistic sound effects
• Stunning HD graphics
• Smooth gameplay
